text:
The overall ambiance of the restaurant is delightful, and the beautiful decor at the entrance drew me in. I must say their herbal duck leg truly stands out from other places. The rich, juicy texture offers an unforgettable treat for the taste buds, with every bite infused with the aroma of herbs.

The stir-fried vegetables are also exceptionally crunchy and refreshing, though slightly heavier in flavor compared to other spots. However, the herbal chicken was less impressive—the meat was on the dry side. I’d definitely recommend going for the duck instead!
First time trying Angelica roast duck — loved the light herbal fragrance, super comforting! The salted egg yolk shrimp balls were super bouncy and tasty too!

Food taste is amazing, and most likely, it is their CharSiu..

Service is good, fast responsive, and polite.

Environment is a little bit pack, but consider is clean. the only complaint is too bright. should install the curtains to block the sunlight.

Awesome set meal which is both delish and afforable. Nice combo to choose from within the set meal for a meat, vegetable & tofu/egg which also comes with rice, tea and dessert. Service is okok with nice ambience atmosphere.
Amazing food and service as always. Duck was the highlight tasted fresh and tender together with the aromatic herbal sauce. Truly one of their best dishes.
